alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 12 at 1:46AM CDT until April 12 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Missouri, Perry MO, Bollinger, Cape Girardeau, Wayne MO, Carter, Ripley and Butler Counties. In Illinois, Jackson County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The dense fog will work southwest from the Carbondale Illinois and Perryville Missouri area, southward along the southeast Missouri Foothills to the Arkansas and Missouri border through the overnight hours, then lift northward after daybreak.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
